prompt: create an application to send email and text marketing email and text after uplaoding email ids and phone numbers in order to generate marketing or sms template take input as image,excel,pdf,word,website url

agent1.prompt: create an application to send email and text marketing email and text after uplaoding email ids and phone numbers in order to generate marketing or sms template take input as image,excel,pdf,word,website url

features.title: Multi-Source Contact Import
features.description: Allow users to upload contact lists from various file formats and sources. Support seamless data ingestion from different file types.
acceptanceCriteria: Support file upload: Excel, CSV, PDF, Word documents
Enable direct URL import for contact lists
Validate and clean imported contact data
Detect and remove duplicate contacts

features.title: Marketing Template Generator
features.description: Create dynamic marketing templates for email and SMS using AI-powered image and text recognition. Generate personalized content based on uploaded templates.
acceptanceCriteria: Support image-based template input
Extract text and design elements from uploaded images
Generate customizable email and SMS templates
Provide template preview and editing capabilities

features.title: Multi-Channel Campaign Management
features.description: Manage and execute marketing campaigns across email and SMS channels. Track delivery, engagement, and performance metrics.
acceptanceCriteria: Schedule campaigns for specific dates/times
Segment contact lists
Track message delivery status
Generate campaign performance reports

features.title: Compliance and Security
features.description: Ensure data privacy and compliance with marketing communication regulations. Implement robust security measures for contact data.
acceptanceCriteria: GDPR and CCPA compliance checks
Secure data encryption
Opt-out management for contacts
Audit logging of all communication activities

stories.userStory: As a marketing professional, I want to easily import contact lists from various file formats, so that I can quickly build and update my contact database without manual data entry
acceptanceCriteria: Given a user has a contact list in CSV, XLS, or XLSX format
When the user uploads the file to the contact import section
Then the system should validate and automatically map contact fields with minimal manual intervention
implementationNotes: Develop file format parsers for CSV, XLS, and XLSX
Implement data validation and deduplication checks
Add error handling for incompatible file formats

stories.userStory: As a marketing designer, I want to use AI-powered tools to generate dynamic marketing templates, so that I can create personalized content more efficiently
acceptanceCriteria: Given a user uploads an existing marketing template
When the AI processes the template's text and image elements
Then the system generates multiple personalized variations with contextual relevance
implementationNotes: Integrate machine learning image recognition models
Develop natural language processing for text analysis

stories.userStory: As a marketing manager, I want to manage and track marketing campaigns across email and SMS channels, so that I can optimize engagement and measure performance
acceptanceCriteria: Given a marketing campaign is created with multiple communication channels
When the campaign is launched
Then the system tracks delivery rates, open rates, click-through rates, and provides real-time analytics
implementationNotes: Implement delivery and engagement tracking mechanisms
Create real-time reporting and visualization tools

stories.userStory: As a compliance officer, I want robust security and privacy controls for contact data, so that we maintain regulatory compliance and protect user information
acceptanceCriteria: Given contact data is imported or managed in the system
When data processing occurs
Then the system enforces encryption, access controls, and maintains audit logs
implementationNotes: Ensure GDPR and CCPA compliance mechanisms
